document.full_text: the sponsor of a bill to end collective bargaining for non-uniformed public workers in nine medium-sized oklahoma cities said thursday his measure is not part of an organized attack on labor unions.
document.title: oklahoma bill on city workers draws union criticism
lines_and_colors: the sponsor of a bill to end collective bargaining for non-uniformed public workers in nine medium-sized oklahoma cities said thursday his measure is not part of an organized attack on labor unions.
